titleStmt.title: The love-sick king, an English tragical history with the life and death of Cartesmunda, the fair nun of Winchester / written by Anth. Brewer.
titleStmt.author: Brewer, Anthony, fl. 1630-1655.

notesStmt.note: Revived in 1680 under title: The perjured nun.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
